WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
We are trying to make the chart movable in a drag drop manner. 
The drag drop operation involves an remove and insertat operation to shift its location in the collection. 
This process appears to reset the AxisOrientation dp on the axes collection to None. 
This causes the location to be evaluated as Auto
This causes an exception on the next render as the rendering code needs to know where the axis will be located.
 
The drag drop works if no axes are configured in xaml (as it auto creates them) but if there are custom ones their properties appear to be undone by the Drag Drop operation.
 
Has anyone seen this behavior before or have any suggestions to fixing it?
 
Cheers
WorkItem.Summary: Drag drop chart - Cannot determine the size of an axis without an orientation.
